speaker: Agent
text: Hello, is this Ms. Thompson? This is Jordan from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi, yes this is she. I'm doing okay, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding a past due balance on your account with XYZ Bank. Can I have your date of birth to locate your records?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Ms. Thompson. Now, you have an outstanding balance of $500. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I wasn't aware of that amount. I need to check my records first.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. However, it's important to resolve this quickly to avoid further fees. Can I note that you are planning to check your records?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I will do that, but I can’t commit to a payment right now.

speaker: Agent
text: That’s completely fine. Please reach back out once you verify the information. Just a quick reminder, thank you for your time today.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay, I appreciate your understanding. Bye.

speaker: Agent
text: Goodbye, Ms. Thompson. Have a great day!
